title: How do I manage a specific application using Manage apps?
answer:
In the upper part, you can switch to the desired tab (application list): All, Running, On SD card, and Downloaded. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109616)

 Touch an application, on the displayed screen, you can perform operations on the application, including Force stop, Disable, Clear data, and Clear cache. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109617)
